name: Getnoticed NEIT Capstone
body:
# Project Description 
getNoticed is a SaaS based web application that offers a individual an opportunity to have their own modern and mobile friendly web portfolio without the need of any programming or design skills. A web portfolio creates a centralized location that showcases a persons top skills and qualifications, making it a great option for a individual to set them self's apart other candidates. What makes our product great is that it has the capability to support an unlimited amount of users and a unlimited amount of websites that are all accessible through the web. In addition to this functionality our entire web based saas application incorporates responsive design making it mobile friendly on all devises.

***

# Summary Of Work

**David Landi** 

Responsible for the front end development of our application which included HTML, CSS, and Javascript. He assisted Justin with PHP development on the Tables page.  David also supported Terri by helping out with the database connection as well helping with the structure of how the data was displayed from the database. 

**Terri Gaskell**

Responsible for design and implementation of the sql database along with developing tools for the administrative section of our application. She also help assisted David with the overall design on the admin page and assisted Justin with PHP development on pages that PHP was used to pull data from the database. 

**Justin Barreira**  

Responsible for the development and implementation of the PHP solution needed for our application.  He also supported David on the login and signup page design and and supported Terri with the design structure of the database. 

Overall, each team member contributed equally in regards to both development and documentation. Although we had different responsibilities we supported each other and gained experience with all the technologies used in this project.  We believe the work speaks for itself in regards to the effort put forth in building a great product.

***
